name: Quantic
description: The Quantic Finance cryptocurrency automatically stakes investors’ tokens and in turn compounds as the tokens earned are staked drastically increasing return on principal. Staking is done automatically and auto-compounds as investors’ tokens are staked automatically without requiring DAPP interaction, which separates Quantic Finance from the rest of the competition. By implementing the unique mechanism of a fixed APY, APY generated by staking will not get drained when more people join. In addition to this, the Quantic Finance token provides BUSD reward to holders to provide stable rewards in an uncertain time
